Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Schmidt
Reviews.Content: Perfect. As soon as we revived it, we activated it a d it has worked perfectly since. Could not be happier

Reviews.Title: so far so good
Reviews.Author: hh414
Reviews.Content: so far this phone is perfect. I didn't have any issues activating it. it came much quicker then the date amazon gave me for delivery. there isn't a single scratch or mark on it. this is my first iPhone so still learning but it seems to work perfect.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Joyce Hulse
Reviews.Content: I had no problem activating it literally took me 5 mins to get everything together. Everything was intact and everything was included within the box. the phone is flawless.

Reviews.Title: smart phone as a birthday/Christmas present
Reviews.Author: Elaine
Reviews.Content: My daughter is enjoying her new phone like all her friends.  She was tired of the no-gadget phones.  No problems so far.

Reviews.Title: The phone and the purchase arrangement were fine.
Reviews.Author: Angus
Reviews.Content: Having to deal with my provider to activate it was a weak point but small in comparison to avoiding another insane phone contract.

Reviews.Title: False advertisement
Reviews.Author: meme
Reviews.Content: This item was sold to me as "new". It stopped working after 93 days and I was told by multiple Apple a Stores the warranty expired 3 years prior to me purchasing the phone.  Amazon continues to tell me to go back to the manufacturer. It has been an awful experience.  Never will I purchase from Amazon again.

Reviews.Title: So many problems
Reviews.Author: Cody T Elledge
Reviews.Content: We have had so many problems with the phone, they are countless. Technical dysfunction hourly, goes to silent/vibrate to ring in its own over and over...Not great in corporate meetings

Reviews.Title: dislike
Reviews.Author: tracey morrow
Reviews.Content: I have nothing but trouble the whole week I owned this phone. I have had to replace the charger because the charger stopped working three days after I got the phone. The home button messed up and I couldn't do anything for the "voice commands" popping on 24/7. The verizon store even had to restore the phone 3 different times to get it to work properly and it still was messed up.

Reviews.Title: Overall very nice
Reviews.Author: Bethany
Reviews.Content: At first I was skeptical about the product, but for my first experience with an iPhone, it isn't bad. The internet is fast, the camera is nice, and the apps are awesome.
